Response from CheckApplicantRace to BiasMitigationCheck: Ensures that after checking the applicants race, a mitigation check is performed before any decision. 3. Coexistence between ManualReview and decisions: Ensures that any decision (Approve, Reject, etc.) is accompanied by a manual review, which can help in identifying and mitigating biased outcomes. 4.
